content: **make a tunisian crochet temperature blanket this free pattern gives you all the details so you can chronicle your year in yarn ** blog post includes the full free pattern helpful tutorial videos and my advice to make your blanket-making experience perfect **what you need ** -dk weight yarn sample made with knit picks swish dk in 9 colors with an additional stripe of white to identify the beginning of a month -6mm tunisian crochet hook with cord -scissors -tapestry needle -locking stitch markers join us for a 2020 temperature blanket crochet-along - use #crochettempblanket2020 on instagram and join the tlycmakers 1 facebook group to share your progress 1 https //www facebook com/groups/tlycmakers
